subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the Lance Armstrong doping scandal, a new generation of United States cyclists, led by Andrew Talansky and Tejay van Garderen, has made riding clean a rallying cry.
snippet: In the wake of the Lance Armstrong doping scandal, a new generation of United States cyclists, led by Andrew Talansky and Tejay van Garderen, has made riding clean a rallying cry.
